author: manveen
msg: Displaying the list of contexts alphabetically from the tomcat tree, so that it is easier to locate a context.

author: manveen
msg: * Added users administration properties to the spanish translations list.

author: remm
msg: - Update the algortithm, weighting it towards trying the context CL association
first (since that's what is used now in Catalina). In some very special cases,
the thread binding will be checked, as well as the parent classloader.

author: remm
msg: - The behavior of loader.start changed recently, and I forgot to update reload.
That was causing some invalid CL associations to occur after a reload was done
on a context, which in turn was breaking getResource.openStream. This
